edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.Gravity

Class VectorWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.Gravity.VectorWorld

  • public class VectorWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the items in a world that exert a force of gravity on the player (i.e. planets). Includes methods to add and remove planets, and to find the force experienced at a point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VectorWorld()
      Initializes a VectorWorld to contain no planets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VectorWorld

        public VectorWorld()
        Initializes a VectorWorld to contain no planets.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlanet

        public void addPlanet(Planet p)
        Add the specified planet to the VectorWorld (i.e. it will be used when calculating gravity).
        Parameters:
        p - The planet to add.

      • removePlanet

        public boolean removePlanet(Planet p)
        Remove the specified planet from the VectorWorld (i.e. it will no longer be used when calculating gravity). Return true if the planet was successfully removed, false if it was not (or was not in the VectorWorld).
        Parameters:
        p - The planet to be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the planet was removed, false if it was not (e.g. it was not in the VectorWorld).

      • getForce

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getForce(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos)
        Returns the effective force experienced at the position with coordinates pos.
        Parameters:
        pos - A Vector2 representing a position.
        Returns:
        A Vector2 representing the effective force experienced at position pos.

      • addAll

        public void addAll(PlanetList orbs)
        Add all planets given to the VectorWorld
        Parameters:
        orbs - The PlanetList of planets to add to the VectorWorld.
